name: HENLO: Combat Devolved
description:
SPACE! GUNS! ACTION! 

Grap your space guns, board a space station with your friends and get ready to rumble in Henlo: Combat Devolved. 

Shoot, hide and accidentally fling yourself into space in this horrific D-grade shooter. 

CONTROLS: 

WASD - Move

Left-Click - Shoot

Scroll Wheel - Swap Weapons

Space Bar - Jump

-------------------------------------

A game by Wort Wort Studios for a Game a Week project:

Reece and Brandon - Making the guns do the shooting, implementing pew pew sounds, letting you exist in the same virtual plane as your friends before forcing you to send them into a cycle of death and rebirth

Yas - Creating a beautiful atrocity of a level, HUD to show the progress of slow but imminent death, menus with things to click, finding music that does not at all reflect the tone of the game

-------------------------------------

Music by: 

Cloud Nine - Hayden Folker

Chasing the Killer - Hayden Folker

Stardust - Alex-Productions

Music promoted by https://www.free-stock-music.com
